doc.title: Viure un somni
doc.plot: In the year 2004, the first edition of a new cultural event took place in Barcelona: the Universal Forum of Cultures. During 141 days it brought together people with different interests, knowledge, believes and world views to celebrate diversity and discuss the most significant challenges of the 21st century. This film shows the experiences, ideas, sensations and opinions of many of the individuals who participated in the event.
